name: Tavern Square Table: "Self-Defense"
description: A distinctive square table with soft red padding along its edges, commonly found at The Flagship in Nasha Town.\nIt is natural for drunk patrons to bump into things. But, as the designer of this table claims rather emphatically, "What I really want is to protect the table... Heh, as I'm sure you know, those drunks don't know their own strength."
